title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Plan Your Visit       Where to start? Valley Forge is a fee-free park open year-round and sees nearly two million visitors annually. Historic structures, monuments, and trails cover the 3,500 acre landscape. Let us help you plan your visit.   Â            Basic Information   Where to start when visiting the park.        Directions   Find your way to and around the park.        Places To Go   Explore the park buildings, structures and monuments.              Eating and Sleeping   Local accommodations and places to eat        Things To Do   Explore the park and make new discoveries!        Special Events Calendar   Join us for special comemorations
